summary:

WritingThere's something wonderful about seeing sentences grow, letter by letter, on a blank page...

summary: To celebrate, here’s a picture of Smudge looking his most Chaotic Demonic: Also, I’m opening the comments up for the last week for people to catch up.  Thank you all for your patience and thank you to the WordPress technical folks for getting the comments back on track.  — JS
title: Comments Are Back!

summary: First, a picture of Charlie, looking very intently at our neighbor’s dog: Second, the problem with commenting looks like to be a miscommunication between my site’s code and PHP 8. 1, which will mean absolutely nothing to most of you, but the good news is, WordPress’s folks are cooking up a fix. title: Commenting Problems Update

summary:
We must learn to:

Live in it
Live on it
Navigate it
Surf it
Swim in it
Sail on it
Dive in it
Understand it
Love it
Cherish it
Embrace it

But, above all, don’t drown in it
title: Life is an Ocean
